name: level-up-community-commands
description: Community repository for Level Up for Dynamics 365 custom commands

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.test:collections: npm run validate-collections && npm run update-index
scripts.validate-collections: find collections -name '*.json' -path '*/collections/*' -exec node -e "try { JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync(process.argv[1], 'utf8')); console.log('✅', process.argv[1]); } catch(e) { console.error('❌', process.argv[1], e.message); process.exit(1); }" {} \;
scripts.build:site: npm run update-index && echo 'GitHub Pages site ready'
scripts.dev:test-workflow:
